name: Derangement
description:
Just a cute fun game right?

These are just some files for the beta verion that you can download and play! Feel free to donate if you can (although its not required what so ever)

At the moment its only like a few minutes (maybe) long, but me and my friend are working on it!

Thanks to Sutemo for character sprites and thanks to Noraneko for the backgrounds!

But most importantly, thanks to you for playing!
